name: .SNC File Extension
summary: Learn about .SNC files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can use an SNC file to load the game save data it contains in Sonic Adventure DX (Windows). To do so, place the file in the following directory:
Then, open Sonic Adventure DX and resume the game mode to which your SNC file corresponds.
Modders can modify an SNC file's data using SASave, a player-created save editing utility.
